name: Classic Flap Bag
description: Timeless Classic Flap in black caviar leather with gold hardware. Excellent condition with original box and authenticity card. Minor signs of wear on the chain strap. A true investment piece that transcends seasons.

name: Saddle Bag
description: Iconic Saddle Bag in oblique jacquard canvas. Very good condition with minimal wear. Comes with dust bag and shoulder strap. A statement piece reimagined for the modern wardrobe.

name: Submariner Date
description: Rolex Submariner Date ref. 126610LN. Full set with box and papers. Purchased in 2024. Excellent condition with light desk diving marks. Keeps exceptional time.

name: Neverfull MM
description: Louis Vuitton Neverfull MM in Damier Ebene canvas. Good condition with patina on handles. Interior is clean. Comes with pochette. Perfect everyday luxury tote.

name: Silk Scarf Carré 90
description: Hermès Carré 90 silk scarf in vibrant equestrian print. Like new condition — worn only once. No pulls or stains. Comes with original box and ribbon.

name: Monogram Belt
description: Louis Vuitton Initiales belt in monogram canvas with gold buckle. Size 85. Very good condition with light creasing. A versatile accessory for any ensemble.
